price: 29. Ma Parole ne change pas, et Je ne suis point injuste envers les serviteurs. »
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
